entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. I'm not happy with it at all.
I understand. I'm happy to assist you with a return. Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with your purchase?
It's [customer email address]. I bought one of those VeloBand Pulse things, and it's just not working out for me.
Thank you. I see your order here with the VeloBand Pulse. Could you tell me what issues you're experiencing with the device?
It's constantly disconnecting! It's supposed to track my heart rate and everything, but it keeps losing connection. It's useless! I've only had it for a little over two weeks. I want my money back.

I apologize for the inconvenience you're experiencing with the VeloBand Pulse. I understand your frustration. Let's proceed with the return. Our return policy, which is in place for 90 days, allows you to return items for a full refund if you're not completely satisfied.
90 days? Okay, good. Because I was about to lose it if you told me I was stuck with this thing. So, what do I need to do?

To initiate the return, I'll generate a prepaid shipping label for you. You'll receive it via email within the next few hours. Simply package the VeloBand Pulse securely, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location. Once we receive the returned item, we'll process your refund. It can take up to 10 days for the refund to appear in your account.
Alright, that sounds easy enough. Will I get the full amount back, even with shipping?
Yes, you'll receive a full refund, including the original shipping cost. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's it. I appreciate you handling this so quickly. I was worried I'd be stuck with a useless smart watch.
You're very welcome! We strive to ensure our customers are happy with their VeloFit products. If you have any other questions, don't hesitate to contact us again. Have a great day!
